sense.gloss: to be understood by each other (of thoughts, feelings, etc.), to be comprehended
to exchange with each other (thoughts, feelings, etc.), to express to each other (e.g. intentions), to communicate with each other

sdata.j: ↑人間↑↓にんげん↓は↑互↑↓たが↓いに↑言葉↑↓ことば↓で↑意思↑↓いし↓を↑通↑↓|つう↓じ↑合↑↓あ↓う|。
sdata.e: Human beings communicate with each other by means of language.
